alert.note: Alert for Franklin (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 21 at 2:35PM EDT until August 21 at 2:45PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 245 PM EDT FOR CENTRAL FRANKLIN COUNTY... At 235 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Columbus, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. Locations impacted include... Columbus, Grove City, Upper Arlington, Gahanna, Bexley, Groveport, Ohio State University, Easton, Whitehall, Grandview Heights, Obetz, Urbancrest, Valleyview, Marble Cliff, Port Columbus Airport, Blacklick Estates and Lincoln Village. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
